articles.description: All the latest football and transfer news plus Premier League predictions with the new season starting in two days; time.
articles.title: Transfer news live, Rangers & Premier League predictions and build-up

articles.description: The new Premier League is about to start - BBC Sport chief football writer Phil McNulty and BBC Sport fan writers predict who will finish where.
articles.title: Premier League predictions: Who will finish where in 2024-25?

articles.description: Conor Gallagher is expected to return to Chelsea training on Wednesday, with his Atletico Madrid transfer in the balance.
articles.title: Conor Gallagher to return to Chelsea training as proposed Atletico Madrid move stalls

articles.description: Are European champions Real Madrid going to be even stronger this term, with the likes of Kylian Mbappe and Endrick joining their ranks?
articles.title: Real Madrid: Are the best in Europe about to get better?

articles.description: BBC pundits and Rangers manager Philippe Clement have strong words for referee Marco Guida's decision to send off Jefte in Dynamo Kyiv's Champions League victory.
articles.title: Rangers 0-2 Dynamo Kyiv (1-3): Pundits brand red card a disgrace

articles.description: Former world number one Naomi Osaka says she does not "feel like I'm in my body" following her return to tennis after a maternity break.
articles.title: Naomi Osaka: Former world number one does not feel like herself after maternity break

articles.description: With flag football preparing to join the next Olympics in Los Angeles, is the NFL set to field its own Dream Team in 2028?
articles.title: LA 2028 flag football: Could there be an NFL Dream Team at the next Olympics?

articles.description: Jose Mourinho said he "can't speak" about refereeing decisions he felt led to Fenerbahce's exit from the Champions League.
articles.title: Jose Mourinho repeats 'can't speak' line after Fenerbahce Champions League exit

articles.description: After underwhelming spells at Juventus and Bayern Munich, can former Ajax wonderkid Matthijs de Ligt finally click at Manchester United?
articles.title: Matthijs de Ligt: How will Manchester United's new signing fare at Old Trafford?

articles.description: England Test captain Ben Stokes is ruled out of the remainder of The Hundred after sustaining a hamstring injury.
articles.title: Ben Stokes: Northern Superchargers' England captain ruled out of The Hundred with hamstring injury
